meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bony.
meanings.sent1: Her boniness was evident in the way her bones protruded.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the patient's boniness during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The boniness of the skeleton made it a popular exhibit at the museum.
meanings.sent4: The boniness of the fish made it challenging to fillet.
meanings.sent5: The boniness of the old tree made it look fragile and delicate.

meanings.definition: The condition of having prominent bones.
meanings.sent1: The model's boniness was admired in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent2: His boniness made him a natural choice for the role of a skeleton in the play.
meanings.sent3: The boniness of the Halloween costume made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her boniness in the x-ray surprised the doctors.
meanings.sent5: The boniness of the dinosaur skeleton amazed the children at the museum.
